Funds are paid by GreaterGood.org to benefiting organizations as a grant., 100544=June 15, 2015 - Beautiful color (pink); comfortable; roomy., 103292=When you're a woman living in rural Bangladesh, your employment options are limited. In 1978 Aarong-BRAC stepped up to fill that gap. With a mission to be the best in the world in providing a unique Bangladeshi lifestyle experience, to empower people, and to promote Bangladesh while protecting the environment, their very name means "village fair." From those humble beginnings, Aarong/BRAC has grown into an cooperative that supports more than 65,000 artisans in 13 production centers and 647 sub-centers throughout 2,000 villages in Bangladesh. Offering more than mere jobs, they offer a future, one with skills training, medical benefits, day care center, and retirement benefits., 101848=July 17, 2014 - Love these shorts! Great fabric and fit!, 103994=Established 1992 in Narayongonj, Bangladesh as one of Aarrong's production centers, Minar Ind. is a full-range apparel center. They knit, dye, assemble, and print all of their apparel on site, and will soon begin spinning their own cotton thread. They currently employ approximately 2,000 high and semi-skilled workers and have been certified by the Business Social Compliance Initiative, highlighting their commitment to bettering the wellbeing of their workers., 155657=Jeremiah 29:13 Bracelet, 100086=July 20, 2015 - I bought 5 pair of different colors 2 in pin very comfortable and fit well I am normally a size 2x so I bought XXL and they fit great!}
